article.name: Integrate SeeMetrics with Your KnowBe4 Console
article.title: Integrate SeeMetrics with Your KnowBe4 Console
article.body:
SeeMetrics is a cybersecurity performance management platform. You can integrate KSAT with SeeMetrics to display your KSAT and PhishER data on their platform.

To integrate SeeMetrics with KSAT, you’ll need to provide SeeMetrics with your Reporting API Token, Product API Token, and base URL.

Click the links below to learn how to gather this information.

Generate Your Reporting API Token

First, you'll need to generate and copy your Reporting API Token. For more information, see the API section of our KSAT Account Settings: Account Integrations article. 

Then, you’ll need to save this token somewhere that you can easily access.

Generate Your Product API Token

Next, you'll need to generate and copy your Product API Token. For more information, see our How to Create a Product API Token article.

Important: In the Products field, make sure to select PhishER.

Then, you'll need to save this token somewhere you can easily access.

Find Your Base URL

You will need to provide your base URL to complete the integration with SeeMetrics.

To find your base URL, see the table below:

If your URL starts with: Your base URL is:
training.knowbe4.com https://us.api.knowbe4.com
eu.knowbe4.com https://eu.api.knowbe4.com
ca.knowbe4.com https://ca.knowbe4.com
